decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:21064 HHP 01.01; 21064 HHP 02.01 REV B; 21064 HHP 04.01 REV B; FIRE STATEMENT STRATEGY.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the first floor eastern flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The rooflights in the flank elevation of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey side infill extension; two storey rear extension; single storey side extension; re-location of main entrance to front with steps; conversion of garage to habitable room with installation of windows to front; Juliette balconies to front and rear elevations at first floor level; balustrade at front and side to form first floor roof terrace; alterations to roof; rooflights in side roofslopes; installation of solar panels to both side roofslopes; external alterations (demolition of front and rear bay windows)
